medical_history.chief_complaint: Hepatic adenomas co-occurring with fibrolamellar carcinoma.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The cases involved synchronous and metachronous occurrences of hepatic adenomas and fibrolamellar carcinoma. One patient had both a primary resection for fibrolamellar carcinoma and a subsequent resection for recurrent disease. Another patient had hepatic adenomatosis with 410 adenomas.
medical_history.past_medical_history: A history of the Carney complex in one patient, associated with a significant number of hepatic adenomas.
medical_history.family_history: Maternal history of the Carney complex in one of the patients.
